text.tspan: Maarten van Gompel, Martin Reynaert & Antal van den Bosch
Tilburg Center for Cognition and Communication
FoLiA development is being funded by CLARIN-NL
CLAM wraps around your command-line NLP tools and turns them into
fully fledged RESTful webservices with minimal effort. CLAM also acts
as a modern web application, with which end-users can interact
file for CLAM that describes the behaviour
of your application in terms of profiles
System Wrapper Script - A script that CLAM
invokes and which should in turn invoke your
- No need to modify actual NLP
(from for example PDF or MS Word)
4) start the project, wait for completion
